package.name: shoppingfeeder
package.summary: ShoppingFeeder allows you to manage product feeds for any kind of channel, and track everything.
package.description: ShoppingFeeder allows you to manage product feeds for any kind of channel - and get a holistic view of traffic, conversions and ROI. By far the best value extension out there! Use ShoppingFeeder to import your Shopify product catalogue, export it to numerous channels that have various feed specifications and requirements and then track all the clicks, referrals, conversions that result from the distribution of your product date. Export to Google, Shopping.com, Nextag, kelkoo, PriceCheck, Shopmania, Fruugo and more! To set up your ShoppingFeeder account and install this extension seamlessly, create an account at: http://www.shoppingfeeder.com/register
package.notes:
This version is the first to support multi-store installations, including: - Store-specific currency pricing at Magento's internal exchange rate - Base currency override
Features include: - One-click feed export to numerous channels - Built-in order tracking - Click & referral tracking - Historical order importing for reporting and ROI analysis
